posts.post_content: I have a Mathewson Portrait in PSA 4 and a Evers Portrait in PSA 4 that I would like to trade even for the same cards in SGC 50 I prefer the SGC's but I know some people prefer the PSA's, I know this may be a shot in the dark but thought I would give it a try. If anyone would like scans of the cards let me know. Thanks.
